trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Santa Clarita
There were no other sightings in Santa Clarita on or around September 29th 2011
Summary: Object, or objects they were more than 4 pulsating red lights hovering. They headed towards Palmdale.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 7:35pm, pacific time.I had come back from picking up my kids from daycare. I parked the car in the alley and started walking towards the house. I then spotted two pulsating red lights hovering. I rushed to the house to tell my mom. She was inside watching her primetime show. We ran outside and that is when we notice that there were more red lights pulsating. We grab the camera and started filming. They started to go left towards Palmdale. Then we spotted the next set of pulsating lights. behind the first object. We also recorded that object. We noticed that a white solid light followed the red lights. After we lost sight of the objects, we heard helicopters and other crafts flying around.
